duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate a commercial vehicle and haul live birds while adhering to safety policies and procedures.
Pick up a trailer loaded with empty cages and transport them to the poultry farm.
Unbind and unload cages at the poultry farm, then reload and restack them onto the trailer.
Transport loaded cages to the processing plant, bind the load of cages, and drop the trailer at the live haul shed.
Comply with Tyson and DOT driving specifications, complete the required log book and dispatch, and lift 40 lbs. occasionally.

education_certification.credential: Valid Class A CDL and minimum age of 21 years
